targets.expr: sum by(verb, resource, subresource) (rate(apiserver_request_total{verb!~"CONNECT|WATCH", verb=~"$verb", instance=~"$instance:.*", resource=~"$resource"}[$__range]))

max by (verb) (rate(apiserver_response_sizes_sum{verb!~"CONNECT|WATCH", verb=~"$verb", instance=~"$instance:.*", resource=~"$resource"}[$__rate_interval])/rate(apiserver_response_sizes_count{verb!~"CONNECT|WATCH", verb=~"$verb", instance=~"$instance:.*", resource=~"$resource"}[$__rate_interval]))

max by (verb, resource, subresource) (rate(apiserver_response_sizes_sum{verb!~"CONNECT|WATCH", verb=~"$verb", instance=~"$instance:.*", resource=~"$resource"}[$__rate_interval])/rate(apiserver_response_sizes_count{verb!~"CONNECT|WATCH", verb=~"$verb", instance=~"$instance:.*", resource=~"$resource"}[$__range]))

max by (verb, resource, subresource) (rate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_sum{verb!~"CONNECT|WATCH", subresource!~"exec|log", verb=~"$verb", instance=~"$instance:.*", resource=~"$resource"}[$__range])/rate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_count{verb!~"CONNECT|WATCH", subresource!~"exec|log", verb=~"$verb", instance=~"$instance:.*", resource=~"$resource"}[$__range]))

sum(rate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_bucket{verb!~"CONNECT|WATCH", job="kube-apiserver", instance=~"$instance:6443", verb=~"$verb"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le) / scalar(sum(rate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_count{verb!~"CONNECT|WATCH", job="kube-apiserver", instance=~"$instance:6443", verb=~"$verb"}[$__rate_interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_bucket{verb!~"CONNECT|WATCH", job="kube-apiserver", instance=~"$instance:6443", verb=~"$verb"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, le))
